Summary Senior SAP-ABAP Consultant having experience of full cycle SAP implementation, support and migration projects. Extensive knowledge in SAP-ABAP WRICEF area with more than 8 years of working experience in IBM Global Business Services. Experienced in Automotive, Telecommunication, Pharmaceutical, Agribusiness and Diversified Machinery industries. 
 
Skillset - 
 
* Report - Classical, ALV (Grid/ List/ Object Oriented), Interactive 
* Interface - ALE IDoc/EDI (Inbound/Outbound Enhancements and Configuration), RFC and Application/Presentation Server File transfer.  
* Conversion - LSMW, BDC and BAPI 
* Enhancement - User Exit, Badi, Enhancement Spot, BTE and Substitution Exit 
* Forms - SAP Script, Smart forms and Adobe Print Forms 
* Module Pool Programming – RF Technique and HTML template designing for MX9 device 
* Workflow 
* ABAP Web Services  
* Advanced debugging

* Performance Tuning Experience SAP ABAP Onsite Lead Developer IBM Global Business Services November 2011  – Present (3 years 10 months) Peoria, Illinois Area Consult and coordinate with Business to gather the requirements. Assist Functional Team in preparing Functional Specification with Technical inputs in various modules like SD, IM, WM, MM, PP, FI, CO, QM etc. Provide estimation and complexity of the ABAP developments. Coordinate with offshore India and Mexico team. Design and develop high complexity objects from onsite. Review ABAP code, Technical Specification and Unit Testing Document. Assist Functional Team in Unit Testing. Validate and apply OSS notes. Work on priority production tickets (incident as well as change management) from onsite in complex SAP Landscape containing ECC, SCM and GTS. Work as a transport co-ordinator for over all project and perform cutover activities prior to major and interim releases. SAP ABAP Technical Team Lead IBM Global Business Services July 2010  –  October 2011  (1 year 4 months) Kolkata Experienced as Technical Team Lead handling multiple projects. Assist team members in technical issues. Performed as Subject Matter Expert for quality review and performance improvement of ABAP programs. Experienced in working in Functional areas like Sales and Distribution, Inventory Management, Warehouse Management, Material Management, Production Panning, Finance and Costing. Worked on complex RICEF as a senior ABAP developer from offshore. Attended blue printing sessions for 3 months in client location Portsmouth, UK and provided best possible technical solution for client requirements. Summary I am a SAP Technical Consultant with more than eight years of work experience in SAP ABAP across all modules including R3 and APO as well as BW of APO. Have worked with some of the leading global clients in the Manufacturing Retail and the Consumer Product Goods sectors including Nestle, Marks & Spencer (M&S), General Motors (Chevrolet), PepsiCo, Philippe Morris International and the current one being British American Tobacco (BAT).
